document.full_text: yemen's opposition warned the government on thursday that violence against street protesters demanding the removal of president ali abdullah saleh could derail a deal aimed at ending the political standoff.
document.title: yemen opposition warns bloodshed may derail deal
lines_and_colors: yemen's opposition warned the government on thursday that violence against street protesters demanding the removal of president ali abdullah saleh could derail a deal aimed at ending the political standoff.
